Articles.Content:
Shortly after pressing play on the launcher, my game crashes and stops working. The game is unable to even load yet. The game is also unmodded, completely clean install. In fact i've tried reinstalling it twice with no luck.


build id = 01891
2017.10.05

Are you trying to launch 32 bit or 64 bit?

What operating system? (Looks like windows 10 64 bit?)

Have you tried just using the .exe instead of the launcher? Make sure to run it as an admin too.

Im running widows 64 bit and the 64 bit version of the game. I have tried running from the exe and as an administrator and still get the same crash

Edited December 26, 2017 by L21Hellcat

41 minutes ago, L21Hellcat said:

Im running widows 64 bit and the 64 bit version of the game. I have tried running from the exe and as an administrator and still get the same crash

Is the game making an actual crash log? It'll be in the KSP folder, in a folder named as a date.

Is this the first time you've tried to install and play KSP on this computer or have you launched it successfully before? You've never used any mods? Or you just deleted them?

Are your graphics card drivers updated?

I don't think the game is generating a crash log. I have had the game installed on this PC before but after updating it this problem came up. Drivers are now updated but the problem is still happening.

Edited December 26, 2017 by L21Hellcat
Thank you very much for the help. I fixed the problem. It turns out MSI Afterburner did not agree with KSP.

21 minutes ago, L21Hellcat said:

Thank you very much for the help. I fixed the problem. It turns out MSI Afterburner did not agree with KSP.

Glad to hear you sorted it out, sorry about the late response. I got busy doing something for a bit.
